html: A lion—The watchmen cried out, I see also a lion marching before the horsemen and chariots: which they suppose to represent Cyrus or Darius marching in the head of their armies. My lord—The watchman speaks to the prophet, who had set him in this station. Whole nights—According to thy command I have stood, and do yet stand continually, both day and night, upon my watch—tower.
